name: Cassette Rewind
description:
Description

A game made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 in 7 days. 

Try to survive the longer in this endless runner action platform. Evade the obstacles to reach higher scores.

Theme

Rewind

Controls

Arrow keys to move

Down to Crouch

Space to Jump (and wall jump)

R to rewind in time

E to grapple
